subject: WALKIN INTERVIEW CALL LETTER
body: Hi, We are pleased to inform you that you have been shortlisted for a walk-in interview for the position of Software Developer at Super Group Job. The interview is scheduled for October 30, 2025, at 10:00 AM at our office located at 123 Tech Park, Silicon Valley. Please bring your updated resume, a valid ID proof, and any relevant certificates. We look forward to meeting you and discussing how you can contribute to our team. Best regards, Super Group Job Recruitment Team.
